DbSql.Text: SELECT TOP 4 A.ItemNumber,A.StoreId,A.ItemName,A.Price,A.PromotionPrice,A.IsPromotionItem,B.ItemImageUrl FROM New3c_Items A JOIN New3c_ItemImage B ON A.ItemStatus =N'Active' AND A.ItemNumber=B.ItemNumber AND A.IsPromotionItem = 1
SELECT TOP 4 ItemNumber,ItemImageUrl FROM New3c_ItemImage WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE IsNavBar = 1
SELECT TOP 20 CategoryPicID,ItemsCategoryItemName,ItemsCategoryPrice FROM New3c_ItemsCategoryPrice WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE ItemNumber = @ItemNum Order By CategoryPicID ASC

INSERT INTO New3c_Items VALUES (@StoreId,@ItemName,@SubCategoryId,@Price,NULL,@Inventory,NULL,@ItemStatus,0,@IsPromotionItem,@CategoryId,@Indate)
SELECT TOP 1 ItemNumber FROM New3c_Items Order By InDate Desc

DECLARE @TempList TABLE ( ItemNumber int ,ItemImageUrl nvarchar(100) ,IsPrimary BIT ,IsNavBar BIT ,IsNew BIT ,CategoryPicID varchar(6) )
INSERT INTO @TempList ( ItemNumber ,ItemImageUrl ,IsPrimary ,IsNavBar ,IsNew ,CategoryPicID ) SELECT ItemNumber = T.c.value('(ItemNumber/text())[1]','int') ,ItemImageUrl = T.c.value('(ItemImageUrl/text())[1]','nvarchar(100)') ,IsPrimary=0 ,IsNavBar=0 ,IsNew=0 ,CategoryPicID = T.c.value('(CategoryPicID/text())[1]','varchar(6)') FROM @RequestXML.nodes('/ItemImageList/ItemImage') T(c)
INSERT INTO New3c_ItemImage ( ItemNumber ,ItemImageUrl ,IsPrimary ,IsNavBar ,IsNew ,CategoryPicID ) SELECT ItemNumber ,ItemImageUrl ,IsPrimary=0 ,IsNavBar=0 ,IsNew=0 ,CategoryPicID FROM @TempList

DECLARE @TempList TABLE ( ItemNumber int ,StoreId int ,ItemsCategoryName nvarchar(16) ,ItemsCategoryPrice decimal(10,2) ,ItemsCategoryPromotionPrice decimal(10,2) ,CategoryPicID varchar(6) )
INSERT INTO @TempList ( ItemNumber ,StoreId ,ItemsCategoryName ,ItemsCategoryPrice ,ItemsCategoryPromotionPrice ,CategoryPicID ) SELECT ItemNumber = T.c.value('(ItemNumber/text())[1]','int') ,StoreId = T.c.value('(StoreId/text())[1]','int') ,ItemsCategoryName = T.c.value('(ItemsCategoryName/text())[1]','nvarchar(16)') ,ItemsCategoryPrice=T.c.value('(ItemsCategoryPrice/text())[1]','decimal(10,2)') ,ItemsCategoryPromotionPrice=NULL ,CategoryPicID = T.c.value('(CategoryPicID/text())[1]','varchar(6)') FROM @RequestXML.nodes('/SubItemList/Item') T(c)
INSERT INTO New3c_ItemsCategoryPrice ( ItemNumber ,StoreId ,ItemsCategoryItemName ,ItemsCategoryPrice ,ItemsCategoryPromotionPrice ,CategoryPicID ) SELECT ItemNumber ,StoreId ,ItemsCategoryName ,ItemsCategoryPrice ,ItemsCategoryPromotionPrice ,CategoryPicID FROM @TempList

DECLARE @SQL NVARCHAR(1000) = N''
--根据查询条件拼装 SQL 查询条件
DECLARE @QueryCondition NVARCHAR(MAX) = N'' IF(ISNULL(@ItemNumber,'')<> '') BEGIN SET @QueryCondition += N' AND ItemNumber = @ItemNumber' END IF(ISNULL(@ItemName,'')<> '') BEGIN SET @QueryCondition += N' AND ItemName LIKE N''%'+@ItemName+'%''' END
Begin SET @SQL+=N' SELECT * FROM New3c_Items WHERE ItemStatus = @ItemStatus '+@QueryCondition+' ' PRINT @SQL END
EXECUTE sp_executesql @SQL, N'@ItemStatus nvarchar(10) ,@ItemName nvarchar(16) ,@ItemNumber int', @ItemStatus , @ItemName ,@ItemNumber
SELECT TOP 10 ItemNumber,ItemImageUrl,CategoryPicID FROM New3c_ItemImage WHERE CategoryPicID = @CateGoryID

SELECT A.Amount ,A.CategoryPicID ,B.ItemName,B.ItemNumber,B.Price , B.StoreId, C.ItemImageUrl FROM [New3c_ShoppingCart] A ,New3c_Items B ,New3c_ItemImage C WHERE B.ItemNumber =A.ItemNumber AND A.UserID =@Id AND A.CategoryPicID = C.CategoryPicID
